Texto: 
gross deformity about the wrist with tenderness to touch.
orif by orthopedics.
there is a fracture through the growth plate with dorsal displacment of the epiphysis relative to the proximal long bone and associated soft tissue swelling.
salter harris fracture type 1
fracture
salter harris 1 (epiphyseal) fracture.
9 year old boy who fell off a play structure - now with pain in his right wrist.
